this_title: A Hotel for the Super Rich and Famous Season 1
introduction: The series follows the hotel’s General Manager, Thomas Kochs, as he faces new challenges and pressures from competing five-star hotels to deliver the best-in-class. In this documentary special, the 500-person staff comprised from 54 nationalities share their exclusive behind the-scenes experiences, alongside guest appearances from Grammy® award-winning musician Will.i.am, to sh...
